Introduction

Park Hyo Jin (박효진), also known as Narsha, is the Lead Vocalist and Lead Dancer of the girl group Brown Eyed Girls. Aside from singing, Narsha was also known to be a Variety star.

Narsha is the first member of Brown Eyed Girls to get married.
